sourcesContent:
class FragmentShader {

    constructor() {
        this.file = [
            // Float precision
            "precision mediump float;",
            // Fragment shader input variables
            "varying vec2 TexCoords;",
            "varying vec3 Normal;",
            "varying vec3 FragPosition;",
            //"varying vec4 FragPosLightSpace;",
            "varying vec3 DiffuseColor;",
            // Texture samlers
            "uniform sampler2D textureImage;",
            "uniform sampler2D shadowMap;",

            "uniform vec3 objectColor;",
            "uniform vec3 viewPosition;",
            "uniform vec3 lightPosition;",
            "uniform vec3 lightColor;",

            "",
            "varying vec3 fragColor;",
            "varying vec3 Normal;",
            "varying vec3 fragViewDirection;",
            "",
            "vec3 lightDirection = normalize(vec3(1.0, 2.0, 3.5));",
            this.n, // the shininess parameter\n
            this.ka, // the ambient reflection color
            this.Ia, // the ambient illumination color
            this.kd, // the diffuse surface reflection color
            this.Id, // the diffuse illumination color
            this.ks, // the specular surface reflection color
            this.Is, // the specular illumination color
            "",
            "void main() {",
            "",
            "   kd = fragColor;",
            "   ka *= kd;",
            "   vec3 normal = normalize(Normal);",
            "   vec3 R = normalize(2.0*dot(normal,lightDirection)*normal - lightDirection);", // Could also have used the function reflect ()
            "   float dotNL = max(dot(normal,lightDirection), 0.0) ;", // If negative , set to zero
            "   float dotRV = max(dot(R,normalize(fragViewDirection)), 0.0);",
            "   if ( dotNL == 0.0) dotRV = 0.0;", // Do not show highlight on the dark side
            "   vec3 shadedColor = Ia*ka + Id*kd*dotNL + Is*kd*pow(dotRV, n);",
            "",
            "	gl_FragColor = vec4(shadedColor, 1.0);",
            "}"
        ].join("\n");
    }

    SetDiffuseColor(intensity, surface) {
        this.Id = "vec3 Id = vec3(" + intensity[0] + "," + intensity[1] + "," + intensity[2] + ");"; // the diffuse illumination color
        this.kd = "vec3 kd = vec3(" + surface[0] + "," + surface[1] + "," + surface[2] + ");"; // the diffuse illumination color
    }
}

export default FragmentShader;
